headline: Progressive Announces Dividend Information And 2025 Annual Meeting Record Date
summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Dec. 09, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- On December 6, 2024, the Board of Directors of The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) declared an annual common share dividend, in the amount of $4.50 per share, and a quarterly common share dividend, in the amount of $0.10 per share. Both the annual and quarterly dividends are payable January 16, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on January 9, 2025. The annual dividend amount for 2024 was determined by the Board ba

headline: Why Progressive (PGR) is a Top Value Stock for the Long-Term
summary: Whether you're a value, growth, or momentum investor, finding strong stocks becomes easier with the Zacks Style Scores, a top feature of the Zacks Premium research service.
